journey.title: Journey
journey.subtitle: Professional and educational path I have taken

timelineData.title: Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate (PL-300)
timelineData.description:
I earned the Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate (PL-300) certification, demonstrating proficiency in preparing, modeling, visualizing, analyzing, and securing data using Power BI. The certificate proves I design effective dashboards and translate business requirements into actionable insights that support business decisions.

See certificate

timelineData.title: Data Analyst ‚Äî Novartis Global Artwork
timelineData.description: I was a core member of the international operations team. I designed and maintained reporting dashboards, developed analytical tools, and established KPIs to monitor performance. I led process-optimization projects, supported SAP workflow integrations, and delivered actionable insights that influenced strategic decisions.

timelineData.title: Engineer's Degree ‚Äî Wroc≈Çaw University of Science and Technology
timelineData.description: I completed an Engineer's degree in Management Engineering with a specialization in IT Applications in Business. For my final thesis I developed an interactive R Shiny application to monitor the product-labeling process at a pharmaceutical company, which improved transparency and decision-making efficiency.

timelineData.title: Intern ‚Äî Novartis Global Artwork
timelineData.description: I supported the international operations team by assisting supervisors with daily tasks, preparing and automating recurring reports, and contributing to internal initiatives. I developed practical skills in data handling, process documentation, and cross-department communication.

timelineData.title: DataCamp Courses
timelineData.description: I completed a series of DataCamp courses covering R programming, data manipulation, data visualization, dashboard development, and introductory machine learning. I applied the acquired skills in practical analytical projects.

timelineData.title: High School ‚Äî Carolinum in Nysa
timelineData.description: I completed an advanced high-school curriculum focused on Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, and English, which helped me develop strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
